tagline: Licensed water/fire damage experts since 2016. Emergency service: 818-462-7299
description: First To Respond Restoration, Inc. is a family-owned, fully licensed, insured, and certified property restoration company serving the San Fernando Valley, Los Angeles, Ventura County, and surrounding areas since 2016. They specialize in water damage restoration, mold remediation, sewage cleanup, fire & smoke damage repair, trauma and biohazard cleaning, and general restoration services for both residential and commercial properties. Renowned for fast response, excellent customer service, and professionally trained staff, the business maintains a positive reputation, multiple industry certifications, and a secure client portal for project updates and documents. Staff experience totals over 20 years combined.
business_hours: Monday to Friday, 7 AM to 6 PM; Saturday, 10 AM to 7 PM; Sunday, closed
